original_title: Turma da Mônica - As Doze Badaladas dos Sinos de Natal
overview: Monica's rabbit disappears and she goes to explain to Chives. The boy, who is helping his mother with the Christmas decorations in her house, full of joy for the special date, is surprised by the arrival of the very angry short girl.
title: Turma da Mônica - As Doze Badaladas dos Sinos de Natal
